channel.title: Why do I sometimes see two Axoloti connections windows? And one of them is named developer?
channel.description: Hello! I noticed a couple of times that suddenly there is two connection windows open on my screen... One of them is called developer the other one is regular window. Sorry I cannot give a picture example now, cause I forgot to snap a picture of it. Will do next time. It have happened numerous times. I think this is very mysterious. Does the developer have got any access to my computer besides of updating factory & community library? Which is done when I push the sync libraries button and only then? I mean this window. Next to the text "Axoloti" in the top of the second window that opens says (developer).

item.title: Why do I sometimes see two Axoloti connections windows? And one of them is named developer?
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

Super. Thank you for the info I didnt really check up on if there was extra features etc., I just closed them and only after a few times, I wondered what it actually were.. Haha

Anyway, always smiling here so no problem with the webcam

Read full topic
item.source: Why do I sometimes see two Axoloti connections windows? And one of them is named developer?

item.title: Why do I sometimes see two Axoloti connections windows? And one of them is named developer?
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

"Developer mode" detects the presence of a .git folder in the axoloti folder, if that's the case, it's supposedly a custom git clone and compile rather than an installed pre-compiled application. Developer mode unhides a few menu items that are useful for developers and potentially confusing for other users. That does not open access to your computer, no need to smile to your webcam

Read full topic

item.title: Why do I sometimes see two Axoloti connections windows? And one of them is named developer?
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

Hello!

I noticed a couple of times that suddenly there is two connection windows open on my screen... One of them is called developer the other one is regular window. Sorry I cannot give a picture example now, cause I forgot to snap a picture of it. Will do next time. It have happened numerous times.

I think this is very mysterious. Does the developer have got any access to my computer besides of updating factory & community library? Which is done when I push the sync libraries button and only then?

I mean this window. Next to the text "Axoloti" in the top of the second window that opens says (developer).

Thanks
